title: hack my acc
body: can i get this acc given back to me??? or banned

replies.body:
Edited the swearing.

Your best bet is to open a support ticket - https://support.riotgames.com/

its says i need to go to my email still, but they changed that aswell :( so i cant do anything....  cant youz guys do something?
You can contact riot about it, see what they can do
